item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @Andrew1112 Andrew1112
item.description:
@Andrew1112 wrote:

I am making a website and i have this www.22salon.com/test_login/test3/client.php i have a code that looks like this

[code]

<?php $ip = "allexser.dnsalias.net"; //put your ipaddress here $port= "43594"; //the port number if (! $sock = @fsockopen($ip, $port, $num, $error, 5)) //Checks the server's status (43594 = port) { echo "Offline"; //When server status is offline, output this } else { echo "Online"; //Else, output this } ?> [/code]

but it doesnt work. it always shows offline. It does connect to the server but it shows fatal error and some1 connecting from flamebox.org in the run server screen i have tried this with many servers.

Read full topic
